nodes.text: The Lorellian Court was an ultra-secret division of Hapan Security. This unit within the Hapes Consortium consisted of select members with little known of the group to outsiders.

Allana Solo knew only three things about the Court namely that she was forbidden to speak of its existence, that she could trust anyone that flashed the secret face-code and that she would be introduced to it on her eighteenth birthday. Trista Zel, Taryn Zel and Jedi Knight Zekk were members of the Lorellian Court.
